pages.title: about
pages.text: Hello, this is Chen Jiahao. I am a researcher engaged in quantitative finance and modern statistics. You can contact me via the following email: qianniao0825@icloud.com. You are welcome to exchange any content with me about financial markets、modern statistics、computational neurology, bioinformatics I also use some software: Python, Matlab, R, Mathematica, SAS. I will also write some summaries of my personal experience, which will be put in the blog, I hope these summaries will play a role for you.
